site.title: Mazarina Trade Company
site.description: One of the largest distribution companies in Azerbaijan

home.hero_title: WE ARE ONE OF THE LARGEST DISTRIBUTION COMPANIES IN AZERBAIJAN!
home.hero_subtitle: For more than 20 years Mazarina Trade Company is a reliable and stable partner in whose portfolio there is a wide variety of goods, which allows us to satisfy the most demanding client.

stats.warehouses: warehouses with 18400 sq. meter in whole Azerbaijan
stats.transports: own transports including 108 camion trucks, 5 heavy trucks, 4 auto car and 8 electric car

home.company_description: Established in 1998, Mazarina LLC had started production and sale of wine and other alcoholic products together with "Ganja Sharab-2" OJSC – the oldest manufacturer in Azerbaijan. In a short time, the products have become the leader of the Azerbaijani alcoholic beverage market and exported to foreign countries.
